text: The 1989–90 Towson State Tigers men's basketball team represented Towson State University as a member of the East Coast Conference during the 1989–90 NCAA Division I men's basketball season. The team was led by head coach Terry Truax and played their home games at the Towson Center. They finished the season 18–13, 8–6 in ECC play to tie for the regular season conference title. The Tigers won the ECC Tournament to earn an automatic bid to the NCAA Tournament as No. 16 seed in the Midwest region. Towson State was defeated in the first round by top-ranked, No. 1 seed Oklahoma, 77–68. == Roster == ==Schedule and results== |- !colspan=9 style=| Regular Season |- !colspan=9 style=| ECC Tournament |- !colspan=9 style=| NCAA Tournament ==Awards and honors== *Kurk Lee - ECC Player of the Year (2nd time) ==References== Category:Towson Tigers men's basketball seasons Towson State Towson State
title: 1989–90 Towson State Tigers men's basketball team
